articles.title: Asus ZenBook Flip S review: A surprisingly fast ultrabook with a 4K OLED screen - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Asus ZenBook Flip S is a solid machine with Intel’s 11th-generation processor, a 4K OLED display, great speakers, a superior stylus, and a keyboard that is comfortable to use in a slim and thin form factor.
articles.content:
Written by Anuj Bhatia
 | New Delhi | 
Updated: December 18, 2020 11:11:27 am
